Description: Painted limestone shabti with a blue lappet-wig, a brown carved face with the eyes traced in black, the neck marked with black crease-lines, a red and black collar enclosing the brown low relief hands and red and yellow hoes, the legs are decorated at the top with a red and yellow representation of Isis with spread wings and inscribed at the front with seven rows of black painted Hieroglyphs separated by black lines, the back is decorated with a representation of seed-basket in red and yellow.
